staxel.village.dialogue.Robin.line:10000: You're the one people are always talking about! The village's saviour or something, right?
So what can I do for you on this fine morning?
Sure, why not? I'm here most mornings anyway!
Gotta keep an eye on ^c:1486b0;Wren^c:pop; to make sure she actually makes her deliveries after all...
Oh... I think I already said that, didn't I?
staxel.village.dialogue.Robin.line:10001: Wanna help me with my rounds?
Nah, just kidding! The head office would kill me if something went wrong...
I always enjoy talking to the locals while I make my rounds!
You wanna know what I'm up to?
Just trying to figure out who this letter is addressed to...
staxel.village.dialogue.Robin.line:10002: I'll deliver everyone's post whatever the weather!
It uh...gets a bit wet sometimes though...
Maybe it's not always the best creed...
I knocked on your door earlier but it seems you were out so I couldn't deliver your parcel...
Huh? You want it now since I'm here anyway?
Sorry, it's already gone back to headquarters.
What...? This parcel has your name on it? No... This is uh...someone else's parcel.
